author: parithosh
content:
Goerli shadowfork 0 analysis: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/goerli-sf-0-analysis

TLDR: Block propagation times seem far lower than goerli (makes sense considering its a smaller network). Metrics are in line with devnet-11. 

What metrics are interesting on this network? 

cc <@360491619402776577> 
Most interesting graphs can be found here: https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/be15cc56-e151-4268-8772-f4a9c6a4e246/blobs?orgId=1&var-network_name=goerli-sf-0&var-client_name=All&var-consensus_implementation=All&var-consensus_version=All&var-geo_continent_code=All&var-heatmap_interval=250&var-interval_tight=$__auto_interval_interval_tight&var-interval=$__auto_interval_interval&var-interval_loose=$__auto_interval_interval_loose&from=1699293912050&to=1699351539067

Change the network filter on top from `goerli-sf-0` to `goerli` or to `devnet-11` to compare data between the networks.
